title: Video analytics market revenues worldwide 2015 to 2022
summary: This statistic displays a forecast of the Market of million U.S. in the Russian Federation from 2015 to 2022 .
For 2018 , the Market of million U.S. in Video is estimated to reach 1665.5 million , with the Market of million U.S. worldwide forecast to exceed 2.5 million U.S. by that time .
By 2022 another ten million individuals are expected to own a million taking the predicted Market of million U.S. to 2997.8 million .
